new_skill_specs.name: deduce_population_impact
new_skill_specs.purpose: To deduce the impact on a population based on changes in life cycle events and select the correct multiple-choice option.
new_skill_specs.outputs: The label of the correct multiple-choice option.
edge_cases: All eggs are eaten, but other factors increase population
Eggs are eaten but some survive due to other reasons

tests.input: {"entities": ["spider eggs", "adult spiders", "predators"], "unknowns": ["Effect on adult spider population"], "options": [{"label": "A", "text": "Adult spider population would remain the same"}, {"label": "B", "text": "Adult spider population would double."}, {"label": "C", "text": "Adults spider population would decrease"}, {"label": "D", "text": "Adult spider population would increase."}]}
